title: BRIEF-Clearside Biomedical announces first patient randomized in phase 2 clinical trial of CLS-TA
author: Reuters Staff
description: * Clearside Biomedical announces first patient randomized in phase 2 clinical trial of cls-ta used together with eylea in patients with diabetic macular edema
text:
July 11 (Reuters) - Clearside Biomedical Inc
* Clearside Biomedical announces first patient randomized in phase 2 clinical trial of cls-ta used together with eylea in patients with diabetic macular edema
* Clearside Biomedical Inc - currently expect to report three-month preliminary data in first half of 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
